5.title: Eliminatoires 5
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Over the course of 11 episodes contestants are given the chance to prove their talent. During the first round of auditions contestants are granted two minutes to prove their talent. If a judge doesn't like the act, he or she can "buzz" (push the big, red button which makes a red cross appear above the stage). When all judges have buzzed, the act stops and the contestant is sent home. If not, then he or she may continue to the next round. In the next round, the judges take on the roll of observers. The episodes are aired live and the viewers vote. The contestant with the most votes advances to the finals. The judges decide whether the second or third place contestant is sent to the finals. In the finals the remaining 8 contestant perform one last time. Once again the viewers vote. This time the act having received the most votes is declared the winner.
imdb.title: Belgium's Got Talent
plot: Over the course of 11 episodes contestants are given the chance to prove their talent. After a round of auditions and several semi-finals, the winner will be declared at the end of a thrilling final.::anonymous
